scenes.text:
The Cardiff University Engineering Society welcomes all the engineering undergrad or postgrad students, lecturers, and any individual interested in knowing more about the engineering field.

As a society, we aim to bring together students and staff to create a healthy, inclusive and active community within the Engineering School.
We don't have a specific day, but specific date and times for socials we run can be found on our SU page and our social media.
Our membership is Â£4.00 for the year! Members get discounted tickets to our events and it includes special offers in food and drinks
Some of our events include: Toga Party, Speed Date Your Engin Mate (to meet engineers from other courses), Christmas Ball (black tie event), Crazy Golf, park walks and picnic!
